msg: Adding hots-tomcat and host-webapp as they are building ok and are required by distribution/pdetarget

author: mrglavas
msg: Implementation of the "root-element-declaration" property. It allows the user to specify the element
declaration to use for validating the validation root (not necessarily the root element of the document).
Its value must either be a javax.xml.namespace.QName or a org.apache.xerces.xs.XSElementDeclaration.
